mainBoard.name: Syr Elenora, the Discerning
mainBoard.originalText:
Syr Elenora, the Discerning's power is equal to the number of cards in your hand.
When Syr Elenora enters, draw a card.
Spells your opponents cast that target Syr Elenora cost {2} more to cast.

rulings.text: The ability that defines Syr Elenora's power works in all zones, not just the battlefield.

To determine the total cost of an opponent's spell that targets Syr Elenora, start with the mana cost or alternative cost that player is paying, add any cost increases (such as that of Syr Elenora's effect), then apply any cost reductions. The mana value of the spell remains unchanged, no matter what the total cost to cast it was.

mainBoard.name: Cartouche of Knowledge
mainBoard.originalText:
Enchant creature you control
When Cartouche of Knowledge enters, draw a card.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has flying.

rulings.text: Cartouche is an enchantment subtype with no special meaning. Other cards may care about which enchantments are Cartouches.

Each Cartouche is an Aura with "Enchant creature you control." If another player gains control of either the Cartouche or the enchanted creature (but not both), then the Cartouche will be enchanting an illegal permanent and be put into its owner's graveyard as a state-based action.
If the target creature becomes an illegal target before a Cartouche spell resolves, the spell doesn't resolve. It doesn't enter the battlefield.

mainBoard.name: Mystic Skyfish
mainBoard.originalText: Whenever you draw your second card each turn, Mystic Skyfish gains flying until end of turn.

rulings.text: If a spell or ability causes you to put a card into your hand without specifically using the word "draw," it's not a card drawn.

The triggered ability can trigger only once each turn. It doesn't matter if Mystic Skyfish was on the battlefield when the first card was drawn. If it's not on the battlefield when the second card is drawn, the ability can't trigger at all that turn. It won't trigger when the third or fourth card is drawn.

mainBoard.text: Whenever you draw your second card each turn, this creature gains flying until end of turn.

飛行機械の整備士が死亡したとき、飛行を持つ無色の１/１の飛行機械・アーティファクト・クリーチャー・トークン１体を生成する
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・工匠

mainBoard.name: Thopter Mechanic
mainBoard.originalText:
Whenever you draw your second card each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Thopter Mechanic.
When Thopter Mechanic dies, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.
mainBoard.text:
Whenever you draw your second card each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.
When this creature dies, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.

foreignData.name: Prüfung des Wissens
foreignData.text:
Wenn die Prüfung des Wissens ins Spiel kommt, ziehe drei Karten und wirf dann eine Karte ab.
Wenn eine Kartusche unter deiner Kontrolle ins Spiel kommt, bringe die Prüfung des Wissens auf die Hand ihres Besitzers zurück.

foreignData.name: Prueba de conocimiento
foreignData.text:
Cuando la Prueba de conocimiento entre, roba tres cartas y luego descarta una carta.
Cuando un Cartucho que controlas entre, regresa la Prueba de conocimiento a la mano de su propietario.

foreignData.name: Épreuve de connaissance
foreignData.text:
Quand l'Épreuve de connaissance arrive, piochez trois cartes, puis défaussez-vous d'une carte.
Quand un cartouche que vous contrôlez arrive, renvoyez l'Épreuve de connaissance dans la main de son propriétaire.

foreignData.name: Ordalia della Conoscenza
foreignData.text:
Quando l'Ordalia della Conoscenza entra, pesca tre carte, poi scarta una carta.
Quando un Cartiglio che controlli entra, fai tornare l'Ordalia della Conoscenza in mano al suo proprietario.

foreignData.name: 知識の試練
foreignData.text:
知識の試練が戦場に出たとき、カード３枚を引き、その後、カード１枚を捨てる。
あなたがコントロールしているカルトーシュ１つが戦場に出たとき、知識の試練をオーナーの手札に戻す。

mainBoard.name: Trial of Knowledge
mainBoard.originalText:
When Trial of Knowledge enters, draw three cards, then discard a card.
When a Cartouche you control enters, return Trial of Knowledge to its owner's hand.

rulings.text: Each Trial has an ability to return to your hand when a Cartouche enters the battlefield under your control. The Trial is returned to its owner's hand only if it's on the battlefield as the ability resolves.

mainBoard.text:
When this enchantment enters, draw three cards, then discard a card.
When a Cartouche you control enters, return this enchantment to its owner's hand.

mainBoard.flavorText: All the wonders of the natural world in one breathtaking microcosm.

foreignData.flavorText: Alle Wunder der natürlichen Welt in einem einzigen atemberaubenden Mikrokosmos.
foreignData.name: Gedeihende Insel
foreignData.text:
Die Gedeihende Insel kommt getappt ins Spiel. Sowie sie ins Spiel kommt, bestimme eine Farbe außer Blau.
{T}: Erzeuge {U} oder ein Mana der bestimmten Farbe.

foreignData.flavorText: Todas las maravillas del mundo natural en un microcosmos asombroso.
foreignData.name: Islote floreciente
foreignData.text:
El Islote floreciente entra girado. En cuanto entre, elige un color que no sea azul.
{T}: Agrega {U} o un maná del color elegido.

foreignData.flavorText: Toutes les merveilles de la nature dans un microcosme à couper le souffle.
foreignData.name: Île prospère
foreignData.text:
L'Île prospère arrive engagée. Au moment où elle arrive, choisissez une couleur autre que le bleu.
{T} : Ajoutez {U} ou un mana de la couleur choisie.

foreignData.flavorText: Tutte le meraviglie della natura in un microcosmo mozzafiato.
foreignData.name: Isola Florida
foreignData.text:
L'Isola Florida entra TAPpata. Mentre entra, scegli un colore diverso dal blu.
{T}: Aggiungi {U} o un mana del colore scelto.

foreignData.flavorText: 自然界のあらゆる驚異がこの美しく小さな世界に詰まっている。
foreignData.name: 興隆する島嶼
foreignData.text:
興隆する島嶼はタップ状態で戦場に出る。これが戦場に出るに際し、青でない色１色を選ぶ。
{T}：{U}か、その選ばれた色のマナ１点を加える。

mainBoard.name: Thriving Isle
mainBoard.originalText:
Thriving Isle enters tapped. As it enters, choose a color other than blue.
{T}: Add {U} or one mana of the chosen color.
